skip_reasons.SKIPPED-INVALID: Defect line numbers or described code did not match actual file contents
skip_reasons.SKIPPED-WONTFIX: Fix would break other functionality, is architecturally inappropriate, or is a feature request rather than a bug

categories_fixed.dark_mode: ~35 fixes — added dark: variant Tailwind classes across components
categories_fixed.accessibility_aria: ~25 fixes — aria-labels, aria-expanded, role=dialog, keyboard nav
categories_fixed.seo_meta: ~20 fixes — SEOHead usage, document.title, noindex, canonical
categories_fixed.terminology: ~15 fixes — standardized tool names, LLM→AI, feature descriptions
categories_fixed.ai_safety: ~12 fixes — disclaimers, prompt injection protection, output validation
categories_fixed.state_bugs: ~15 fixes — race conditions, stale closures, AbortController linking
categories_fixed.bundle_size: ~10 fixes — dynamic imports for heavy libs
categories_fixed.data_integrity: ~8 fixes — cascade logic, Firestore batch limits, validation
categories_fixed.navigation: ~5 fixes — dead-end removal, breadcrumbs, link fixes
categories_fixed.content_model: ~5 fixes — category alignment, notification types, taxonomy

additional_fixes.build_fix: Removed phantom htmlparser2/franc references from vite.config.js manual chunks
additional_fixes.quick_wins_pass: 10 additional defects fixed from skipped backlog — 6 SEO meta, 2 dark mode, 1 a11y, 1 text clarity
